tableName: Allocation of Graphics to Article Numbers
contents: The allocation of graphics to article numbers

attr.name: artNr
attr.description: Article Number in the data supplier format

attr.name: sortNr
attr.description: Sequential sortir number for graphics that belong to the same article, starting with 1 per article. Used to determine the order of display

attr.name: exclude
attr.description: '1' = Country code is an exclusion, '0' = country code is an inclusion

attr.name: loschFlag
attr.description: 1= delet all data records for the Delta key , otherwise 0
